snippet: Former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez had his jailhouse phone calls hacked ahead of his first murder trial, and prosecutors and his current defense team say they were never told, according to a news report Friday....
lead_paragraph: Former New England Patriots star Aaron Hernandez had his jailhouse phone calls hacked ahead of his first murder trial, and prosecutors and his current defense team say they were never told, according to a news report Friday.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez Phone Calls Hacked Before 1st Murder Trial
headline.print_headline: Aaron Hernandez Phone Calls Hacked Before 1st Murder Trial
